A=
t TUSCON=92s command there is dead silence in the hall. The only sounds
tha=
t could be heard was the sound of the door sliding open to admit
SABERBACK =
and SKYBYTE and then those same doors sliding closed again.

Neither STAMPY=
 nor NIGHT VIPER move a micron except to turn and look
at BIG CONVOY.

LONG=
 RACK turned to look at TUSCON as he straightened, =93You do realize
that a=
s a . . . =93

BIG CONVOY cut off LONGRACK with a simple upraised hand. =93=
It=92s a good
plan.=94 He said as he turned to look at LONG RACK and then T=
USCON,
=93With some revision.=94

First glancing down the hall to make sure=
 that they were alone now BIG
CONVOY turned back to the group, =93Long Rack=
, you have some engineering
skills, take Sharp Edge and get into the comput=
er system, see what you
can make happen.=94

LONG RACK straightened, =93Yes=
 sir.=94 He said saluting. SHARP EDGE did
not look quite so happy but never=
 the less nodded.

=93Night Viper, you and Stampy, see what you an do to ge=
t into
Saberback=92s room.=94 BIG CONVOY gestured at TUSCON, =93He=92s righ=
t, the
room is most likely trapped and maybe even bugged.=94

Turning to MA=
CH KICK and SHARP EDGE, =93You are with us.=94 BIG CONVOY
said, =93We can s=
till see if we can rescue Rhinox.=94

Finally BIG CONVOY turned to TUSCON, =
=93My mission and My team.=94 He said
with a tone of finality. =93Follow if=
 you like.=94

And like a rubber band that has been pulled taunt and let go=
, the
entire team leaped into motion.

MACH KICK lightly elbowed TUSCON, =
=93You may be a Prime, but he is a
Convoy.=94 And then he too moved into ac=
tion.

And MACH KICK was right, it was the same thing that LONG RACK was
go=
ing to remind him of. CONVOY=92s were a rare breed, and it is quite
possibl=
e that in his limited experience TUSCON had never really had a
chance to wo=
rk with one. They were soldiers who were at one point a
PRIME, but were ele=
vated to work with the MAGNUS or sent or
specialized missions =96 like this=
 one, to bring back war criminals to
justice.
